message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DL 

This paper deals with the problem of document classification, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of multi-task learning (MTL) and transfer learning (TL) also suggests that this paper could be relevant to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) communities. Additionally, the use of nearest neighbor approach and semi-supervised learning could also make this paper relevant to the deep learning (cs.DL) community.
